Nested.title: Models Are Nested
Nested.description: Models are ordered in least to most specific

Shapes.title: Shapes to Test
Shapes.description: Shapes for model to test, separated by a comma and a space. See documentation for possible shapes.

Days.title: Indicies demarking unique days
Days.description: List of numbers indicating days, separated by a comma.

NumTests.title: Number of Tests
NumTests.description: Total number of tests on a unique day, separated by a comma.

NumPositive.title: Number of Positive ests
NumPositive.description: Total number of positive tests on a unique day, separated by a comma.

Ceil.title: Ceiling
Ceil.description: Sets the ceilieng for the relevant shape constraints

Lag.title: Ceiling
Lag.description: Permits comparisons across proportions more than one day apart

Seed.title: Ceiling
Seed.description: Sets a seed for the purposes of replication. Leave as 0 for a random seed.

nsim.title: Number of Simulations
nsim.description: Number of bootstrap replications to be generated
